Play.Header: PHI wins toss, elects to Receive, and NE elects to defend the South goal.
3-S.Gostkowski kicks 67 yards from NE 30 to PHI 3. 30-J.Reed to PHI 31 for 28 yards (38-K.Eckel).
Philadelphia Eagles at 15:00, (1st play from scrimmage 14:55)

Play.PlayDescription: (14:55) (Shotgun) 14-A.Feeley pass short right to 36-B.Westbrook to PHI 33 for 2 yards (50-M.Vrabel).
(14:22) 36-B.Westbrook right guard to PHI 38 for 5 yards (54-T.Bruschi, 37-R.Harrison).

(13:46) 14-A.Feeley pass short right intended for 36-B.Westbrook INTERCEPTED by 22-A.Samuel at PHI 40. 22-A.Samuel for 40 yards, TOUCHDOWN. NE 22-Samuel 21st career interception, tying Don Webb for 10th place on Patriots all-time list. NE 22-Samuel 1st interception return TD of season, 3rd career regular season (3rd best in Patriots history). Patriots are the only team in the NFL to have not allowed an opponent to score on their 1st possession of games this season.
